hints.workflow_syntax: Remember that GitHub Actions workflows are written in YAML and should be placed in the `.github/workflows` directory.
hints.job_structure: Each job in a workflow runs on a fresh instance of the runner environment and can contain multiple steps.
hints.ci_workflow: For Continuous Integration, make sure your workflow includes steps to check out code, set up dependencies, and run tests.
hints.cd_workflow: For Continuous Deployment, consider using environment secrets for sensitive deployment credentials.
hints.agile_scrum: Use GitHub Projects to organize your work into sprints and track progress on your AGILE board.
